item.title: CPlogy-Initial Operation Report
item.description: Basic Information Platform: Bilibili Key Account Metrics Shift: Followers increased from 285 to 315, Submissions rose from 47 to 48, Total Views surged from 45,000 to 75,000, Likes jumped from 1,400 to 2,000, Coins went up from 696 to 751, Comments expanded from 277 to 405, Favorites climbed from 1,185 to 1,597, Shares marginally grew from 542 to 552. Positioning & Tone Platform Positioning: A comprehensive entertainment and cultural community

item.title: Exploring Practice Paths for Cultural Square Empowerment in Rural Revitalization Under the Context of Cultural and Tourism Communication--An Investigation Based on Feng Village, a National Key Rural Tourism Site in Guangxi, China
item.description: This article is entirely my original work, completed independently on January 10, 2024. Kindly respect the intellectual property rights. The full Chinese text, appendices, reference citations, and other related content are available in the accompanying PDF document. tourism_communication.pdf Abstract With the proposition of rural revitalization and the rise of cultural and tourism industries, the demand for rural image construction and dissemination has increasingly become prominent. Rural cultural squares, as essential

item.title: A Study on the Adoption of Health Information by College Students in Beijing on User-Generated Content Platforms--A Case of Xiaohongshu
item.description: The present article represents a collaborative effort completed by five co-authors, with my contribution focusing specifically on the literature review and data processing sections. The text below encompasses the content of those segments, while the comprehensive full-text version is attached as a PDF file for your reference.
